prompts.name: analyze_research_question
prompts.description: Generate comprehensive analysis of a scientific research question

prompts.name: hypothesis_generator
prompts.description: Generate and evaluate multiple hypotheses for a given scientific problem

arguments.name: problem_statement
arguments.description: The scientific problem to generate hypotheses for

arguments.name: constraints
arguments.description: Any constraints or limitations to consider

prompts.name: literature_synthesis
prompts.description: Synthesize findings from multiple research papers into coherent insights

arguments.name: research_papers
arguments.description: List of research papers or citations to synthesize

arguments.name: synthesis_focus
arguments.description: Specific aspect or theme to focus the synthesis on
